seo.title: Cut Patient Acquisition Costs by 60% | Senova CRM
seo.description: Medical spas save $100K+ yearly with our patient intelligence platform. See 80% of website visitors, 3X conversions. Free ROI calculator inside.
seo.og_image: Hero image showing dashboard with patient analytics and ROI metrics

hero.headline: Turn 80% of Your Website Visitors Into Booked Appointments
hero.subheadline: The only CRM built for medical aesthetics that identifies anonymous visitors, targets high-value patients, and proves ROI on every marketing dollar.

sections.headline: Your Practice Is Losing $30,000 Every Month
sections.subheadline: While enterprise clinics use advanced patient intelligence, you're stuck with basic tools

problems.title: 97% of website visitors leave without booking
problems.description: You paid to bring them there, but can't see who they are or follow up

problems.title: Facebook ads cost $150+ per new patient
problems.description: And half never show up for their appointment

problems.title: Competitors are stealing your patients
problems.description: They're targeting people who visited your site with lower prices

sections.headline: Enterprise-Level Patient Intelligence at SMB Prices
sections.subheadline: Everything the big chains use, at 40% of the cost

features.title: Patient Identification Pixel
features.description: See exactly who visits your website - name, email, procedure interest, and buying intent. HIPAA-compliant and 80% accurate.

features.title: Procedure-Based Audiences
features.description: Target people actively researching Botox, fillers, or laser treatments in your area. Pre-built audiences for 50+ procedures.

features.title: Automated Follow-Up Campaigns
features.description: Convert interested visitors with personalized emails and texts based on the pages they viewed and procedures they researched.

features.title: True ROI Tracking
features.description: See exactly which campaigns bring in patients and revenue. Track from first click to lifetime value.

testimonials.quote: We went from $400 per booked appointment to $190 in just 30 days. The visitor identification alone paid for the entire platform.
testimonials.author: Dr. Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Finally, a CRM that understands medical aesthetics. The pre-built Botox audiences converted at 3X our normal rate.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Park

testimonials.quote: We added $200K in revenue just from remarketing to website visitors we couldn't see before. Game-changer.
testimonials.author: Michael Torres
